message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you our premium product at a special price of $12000. This is a great deal considering its value and quality. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I was hoping for a better deal. Would you be willing to sell it for $9500?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but the lowest I can go while still offering you a great deal is $11000. This price reflects the high value and quality of the product. What do you think?
